item.title: Java Box2D simulation

item.title: Gamecomposer Gameengine
item.description: A complex gameengine compiled to JavaScript and WebAssembly GameComposer Physics Game Example compiled to WebAssembly. GameComposer is available here GameComposer Physics Game Example compiled to JavaScript. GameComposer is available here
